OrgName.entry: JAMIA MASJID AND USMANIA EDUCATION CENTRE

Desc.entry: Teaches Islamic studies, Qur'an, Urdu and Arabic languages. Can provide older children that have completed these courses with further Urdu GCSE and Islamic studies GCSE. Covers the areas of Nether Edge, Heeley and Sharrow and is open to all Muslims. Also has a community advice centre giving advice on Islamic issues, family planning and marriage guidance, Islamic marriages and adult learning.

ProvisionPlace.entry: Jamia Masjid and Usmania Education Centre

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Mon-Sun, all prayer times, 7 days a week (education)
